mapper.select:
select
from persion where sex=1 and use_state=1

select p.id,sum(b.token) totalss ,max(b.create_date) stime from persion p left join balance_of_payments b on p.id=b.persion_id where b.create_date >= #{beginTime} and b.create_date < #{endTime} and b.type = 3 and p.sex = 1 and p.use_state = 1 group by p.id order by totalss desc ,stime asc limit 1;
